GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: TOTAL OF YEAR END MONETARY GIFTS GIVEN TO EMPLOYEES OF LANDON RIDGE IN LIEU OF RESIDENTS TIPPING EMPLOYEES THROUGHOUT THE YEAR. THE LRRC CONSIDERS THIS METHOD OF SHOWING THE RESIDENTS' APPRECIATION MORE EQUITABLE SINCE MANY RESIDENTS DO NOT SEE THE WORK PERFORMED BY "BEHIND THE SCENES" EMPLOYEES, SUCH AS THE KITCHEN WORKERS AND NIGHT SHIFT WORKERS.
